ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Incandescent Mask
ygData.msgSnippet: Argh, the one thing I didnt try!  Thanks I ll do it soon!  BTW, for anyone that dont know what an incandescent mask is, its an AC3 +5 intelligence +7 Charisma
ygData.messageBody:
Argh, the one thing I didnt try!  Thanks I'll do it soon!  BTW, for anyone that dont know what an incandescent mask is, its an AC3 +5 intelligence +7 Charisma mask that you get thru the temple of solusek quest.  It requires a rune from enynti (mistmoore, about level 30 I think), a glowing mask from the skeletal monk in upper guk (not sure of the level, very green and weak at 43), and 2 traded (50 gold) runes... one from madam serena in south quenos and one from Mizr n Marr in the neriak library.  Its one of our only quests that dont require us to take on the nasty shadow men, and quite possibly the best item we get from the temple.
 
I cant wait to get mine!  no more switching between a vail and a bone mask!
 
Cogg - RZ
----- Original Message -----
From: Mindseye
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Sent: Saturday, March 25, 2000 12:36 AM
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Incandescent Mask

From: "Mindseye" <mindseye@...>

Hi...
   Cast invis on yourself and hand her the 50 gold, invis won't come off if you just hand it to her and she will see you as indifferent. Worked for everyone I know =)
----- Original Message -----
From: Garett
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Sent: Friday, March 24, 2000 2:52 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] Incandescent Mask

From: "Garett" <osmosis@...>

Last night I went to Quenos to try and purchase a rune from Madam Serena.  Apparently, she had heard of me from SOMEONE (I'm not naming names) and refused to speak with me, simply took my money.  Not a single illusion would change her mind, nor would any of my 'you like me' spells.  In an act of desperation I attempted to charm her with my magical spells, but apparently she is UNcharmable (I used a full mana dump trying).  For those not knowing why I did this... pets always consider amicable, and a charmed NPC is always happy to trade with me.  Unfortunately, Leutenant something-or-rather saw what I was trying to do (after I had meditated back to full and was trying to charm her again) and hit me, VERY hard.  So now not only do I have to find some way to make Madam Serena like me but I have a grudge with that hard hitting guy.  Do I have to go spend a week in BlackBurrow killing wimpy gnolls or is there some other faster way to make Madam Serena interested in dealing with me?
 
Cogg
